com.github.situx.cunei

Class DrawingCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.github.situx.cunei.DrawingCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class DrawingCanvas
extends android.view.View
    Canvas for drawing lines that indicate cuneiform characters.
